Welcome to the brand new The Advantage program is a centralized Dealer Relationship Program that simplifies the communication exchange between the channel partners and JK Tyre. It rewards dealers who are high performer and acknowledge their effort. It aims in building long term partnership relationship by enhancing the low potential dealers and enabling them to grow. JK Advantage is the only loyalty program which is offered to the dealers across the industry, and today is considered as one of the biggest program.
Dealer has to do minimum turnover of INR 3 Lacs in a quarter with JK to get eligible for enrollment in the program
Dealer has to maintain 3 Lacs turnover every quarter with JK to get the points benefit.
Basis dealer quarter offtake & program structure dealer will earn benefits of the points as per respective slab.
Dealer cannot redeem his points in case enrollment form is not filled available online.
What\'s New Know your platform GJ 01 KM 2900 Edit Car 50 Points / Registration 25 Enrollment to the Program Dealer cannot register more than 5 tyres for a single vehicle in a day.
Dealer cannot register more than 10 tyres for a single vehicle in 6 months.
A six times larger loyalty program wherein channel partners will earn points across categories like PCR, Truck/Bus, SCV/LCV, 2 Wheeler, 3 Wheeler,Farm and Retread.
A cloud enabled scalable technology, available on Web and Mobile.
Now register all your customer car and 2 wheeler with JK tyre warranty online and earn additional points for each registered entry. A dynamic report page, which updates based on daily offtakes for improved transparency.
I have read and agreed to the Terms & Conditions Didn’t get the link?
Resend

Please Note If You Click On Yes This Data Will Be Deleted From Cart Address * Pincode * State * City * fcm_default_channel Street Address * Enter your details Mobile Number Mobile Number * Warranty Report Customer Name Vehicle Number Warranty Number Warranty Points earned Vehicle Type Vehicle Type * No. of tyres purchased You have not invited any sub dealer or branches for warranty registration. \nplease add them for warranty registration Invite Add Member Send Invitation Via SMS Sub Dealer Branch Nick Name * Nick Name Type Invite Sub-dealers or Branch Name Contact Person Name * Add new Members How to register your customer tyre purchase with warranty? Step 1: Enter the customer\'s 10 digit mobile number for WARRANTY REGISTRATION. Step 2: Verify OTP code received on customer\'s mobile number. Step 3: Enter the customer details like First Name, Last Name and Email Step 4: Select the type of vehicle i.e. car or two wheeler and if existing vehicle owner then select the vehicle number Step 5: Complete the remaining details of vehicles as directed. Step 6: Enter the Product details based on tyre description. For example search the product like blaze, touring and you will find the matching product list. Select the correct product description Step 7: Select the number of tyres, customer has purchased and complete the registration. Select Purpose Select Purpose * Select Message Type Select Message Type * Select Communication Type * Change Picture Select Language Select Language * Want to schedule this campaign? Run Now Message Preview Hello Sandeep Bhai! Here’s an offer for you!! Avail BUY 2 GET ANY 1 FREE at Soa and Salon. Hurry and take benefit of this offer. Offer valid till 21-11-2019. T&C applied. Note - This message is a preview of the message that the customer will receive. The message characters and credits will vary as per the customer name and offer. Make sure you keep that in mind before sending the message to all customers. Message Details A message with upto 160 characters (including space and special characters) uses 1 SMS credit(balance). If the message is more than 160 characters, 2 SMS credits are used for that message. Meaning the account balance is debited by 2 SMS. Maximum eligible limit per message is 459 characters. Only English language messages are eligible as of now. JkTyre does not support unicode messages (Indian language messages). Other Language One uni-code character (other language character) is equivalent to four English characters for text message sent in other language. So please check the SMS count before sending the SMS. The ability to read text messages in other languages depends on the receiver’s handset model (compatibility) and the mobile operators.You can type up to 469 characters, if your text message is in another language. Would you like to provide any discount/offer to the customer for giving references? Click here to change offer Add Reference Rewarding customers on sharing references is the opportunity to incentivised customers for sharing their positive experience with others.\n\n83% of satisfied customers are willing to make a referral 92% of consumers trust recommendations from people they know\n\nA referral is not only a lead, but a qualified lead for any business.From a business aspect, acquiring new customers and growing sales is easy when leveraging the voice of established customers. So give the best offers to referrers and referees. Give this Offer to the Referrer. * (Your customer, who gives references) "Note : \"Please provide the SMS content with offer to be sent to referrer\" " Give this Offer to the Referee * Give this Offer(Your prospect for a new sale) "Note : \"Please provide the SMS content with offer to be sent to referee\" " Same as existing Customer offer Store Google My Business Link Store Google My Business Rating Link Warranty Points To enable the “Add Customer Visit” Feature, Please set your preferences. 1123801671354456 1123801671354456 716261112440198 fb266260921485072 Total points earned as per JK Advantage Policy for current financial year, acroll products. Offtake figures are available for entire year, current quarter and current month for current financial year Total points earned on registering PCR and 2W Warranty Registrations through JK Advantage App from April\'19 Number of customer registered warranty on tyre purchase Total PCR tyre registered with warranty till date Total 2 wheeler tyre registered with warranty till date Once the customer data is captured, it\'s important to communicate with them and keep them updated and engaged with your store. Click on appropriate icon to run the SMS campaign for that purpose Displays count of total customer, today\'s visitors and visitors for this month Total references received by the customers, references for the day and for the month Higher the reference count means more happy customers Displays total tyre purchase customers, today\'s customer and this month customers These are the leads or prospects for tyre purchase based on referrals, tyre replacement due etc. Due Period Range, suggests that tyre purchase is due for the span of two months (+/- 30 days). One can select different range as well through a filter Example Festive Wishes, Tyre Service Due etc. This will help in identifying the particular SMS template and appropriate SMS texts will be displayed in the \"Enter Message Text\" box below. Provide the unique campaign name to identify the campaign Example:Elanzo Touring Promotion for PCR service customer or Diwali wishes This will also help in rerun the campaign. Every campaign may have the different target audience Example:Diwali Wishes are for all customers but promotion of alignment service, might be for PCR customers only. So select proper target audience. Select custom to filter the precise target audience for the campaign There are two type of SMS. It is our regular text SMS If you want to share the picture along with text, please select picture SMS. Upload the image. A tiny link will be added at the end of the SMS as the picture link "SMS can be shared in English as well as multiple regional languages like Hindi, Gujarati, Marathi, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Bangali etc " "If you are sharing SMS in English then it will work as regular SMS and 160 characters is considered as 1 SMS. Click on the (i icon) for more details. " "If you are sharing SMS in Regional language then it will work as unicode SMS and 70 characters is considered as 1 SMS. Click on the (i icon) for more details. " "For regional language, just copy the message from respective regional language text editor and paste in the Enter Message Text box below " Please type in your message here. Based on the \"Campaign Purpose\" automated SMS text (template) displays here. Still you can edit here "At the bottom, you will find few variables, available for the campaign\nExample #CustomerName, meaning in SMS text, where this keyword is used, a respective customer name from database will be taken. Means all customers will receive personalized SMS. Like Dear Gaurav, Dear Taral etc. " When you are creating the campaign in your free time and want to run the campaign later, you need to select \"Schedule this campaign\" Select Date and Time of campaign and it will run automatically. Example:coming Sunday is a Diwali and you want to schedule festive wishes SMS prior to a week, you can use this feature Here you can see the actual preview of your SMS, like how will it look in customer\'s mobile. We recommend to review it once, before running the campaign Click on \"Run Now\" to start the SMS campaign Click on \"Schedule Campaign\" to start the SMS campaign You can re-run this help tour by clicking on i icon next to Dashboard on top left corner Now you can find tha total tyres registered under warranty (Category wise) along with number of customers and warranty points earn If you change the purpose the target consumers filter will be reset.\n\n Do you want to continue and change the purpose?
Customers Registered\nwith Warranty Dealers started warranty Customers Registered\nwith Warranty Tyres Registered with Warrranty
Shows the Warranty Active dealers out of total dealers Number of tyres sold under warranty for each category (Secondary Sales). Number of Sensors sold and registered under warranty. Along with the warranty registered customers, now we are displaying number of tyres registered (Category wise) Now warranty reports can be filtered from Year to Month and that is also category wise including sensor data. Also category can be further filtered based on minimum to maximum tyre count per warranty registration.
